name: ArrJiiBii
description:
ArrJiiBii's story is simple: the world has lost color! The great flames Arr, Jii, and Bii have been misplaced, and it's up to you to return them to the temple and restore color.

The gameplay is that of your typical 2D platformer. You can jump, double jump, walljump, you get the point. But to spice it up a little bit, you can also reverse gravity to walk on the ceiling! As you recover the flames, the world gradually regains its color.

I made this game over about a month for my final art project, and I'm pretty happy with the results! As a fair warning, though, it's very short and there are still loose ends. I may or may not continue working on this game, but it felt great to create something new after working on LMATSOH for so long (still working on it...)

CONTROLS (not rebindable yet, sorry!):

ARROWS - move

SHIFT - sprint

Z - jump / double jump

SPACE: reverse gravity

WASD - pan camera
